name: VR Mini Bowling
description: Welcome to the world of Mini Bowling! In this VR game bowling meets mini golf to create a totally new experience!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 330 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift Headset and Controllers Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 330 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift Headset and Controllers Required
